applicability_reasoning: This regulation applies to the pension life cover scheme document for several reasons: 1) The document describes an insurance product provided by AIB life, which is regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland (stated in the document footer). 2) The document outlines a scheme that provides death benefit claims for dependants, making it subject to claims processing requirements. 3) Section 3.1 specifically discusses claims processing, stating 'If a member dies in service and a valid claim is made against the policy, the dependants will be required to provide any evidence and information the trustee may require.' The regulation's requirements about claim decisions, documentation, and communication would directly apply to how AIB life must handle these death benefit claims. 4) The document establishes a contractual framework where claims will be made and processed, making the regulation's requirements for claim decision timing, communication, and record-keeping directly relevant to this product's operation.
regulation_text: 364. (1) Within 5 working days of making a decision in respect of a claim, an insurance undertaking shall inform the claimant of the following, on paper or on another durable medium: (a) the outcome of its investigation of the claim; (b) where applicable, the terms of any claim settlement offer; (c) where the insurance undertaking has decided to decline the claim, the reasons for this decision; (d) any appeals mechanism provided by the insurance undertaking in respect of the decision made. (2) When making a claim settlement offer, the insurance undertaking shall ensure that the following conditions have been satisfied: (a) the insured event has been proven, or accepted by the insurance undertaking; (b) all specified documentation has been received by the insurance undertaking from the claimant; (c) the entitlement of the claimant to receive payment under the policy has been established. (3) An insurance undertaking shall retain a record of the decision referred to in paragraph (1).
source_name: CENTRAL BANK (SUPERVISION AND ENFORCEMENT) ACT 2013 (SECTION 48) (CONSUMER PROTECTION) REGULATIONS 2025
